mapper.select: select count(*) from notice where status = 'Y'

select notice_no , notice_title , user_name , count , to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "create_date" , important , (select origin_name from attachment where category_no = 1 and ref_no = notice_no) "origin_name" from notice n join member on (notice_writer = user_no) where n.status = 'Y' order by notice_no desc
mapper.update: update notice set count = count + 1 where notice_no = #{noticeNo} and status = 'Y'
